name: Bich Ngoan HOTEL
address: 22 Mười Chín Tháng Năm, Trà Vinh, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Trà Vinh, Bich Ngoan HOTEL cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có ban công hoặc sân trong, Wi-Fi miễn phí và TV màn hình phẳng, cũng như khu vườn và sân hiên.

Nơi đây còn có phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen ở tất cả các căn, cùng đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và máy sấy tóc.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Cần Thơ, cách homestay 88 km.

review.room_type: Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive: Équipe accueillante et professionnelle. Possibilité de se balader en vélo. Chambre propre et confortable.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive:
The room was very light.  The view was good through the very large windows. 
The staff were very helpful.
Although the room was on the fourth floor and there was no lift, we could have had a room on a lower floor by paying a little more. This seems reasonable.
review.comment_negative: Outside the hotel,  in the park, was a large public TV  screen. It made a lot of noise.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: Coffee is good,  breakfast is delicious
review.comment_negative: The door to the executive room on the first floor requires immediate fixing, had to use heavy force to open or close it.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Breakfast was in a nice setting. Food was ok.
review.comment_negative: No hot water in the room. Towels were clean but stained.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: It seemed a little expensive for what it was compared to other places I stayed in VN, but I think because Tra Vinh does not get a lot of tourists, there is not as much business for hotels here.  I was very happy with the room and staff here.  I would stay again and recommend.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: La situation de l’hôtel près d’un joli parc. L’aide et la disponibilité du réceptionniste qui parle bien anglais. Le prêt de vélo. Le petit-déjeuner.
review.comment_negative: L’animation musicale du soir qui est bruyante. L’attente assez longue pour le petit-déjeuner. La montée des bagages par l’escalier. Je n’ai pas demandé d’aide mais on ne me l’a pas proposé.

review.rating: i was happy i will stay again
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: area great room very good breakfast very good
review.comment_negative: access to room

review.room_type: Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Every one was very kind and helpful

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The owner who I met what is a nice person and the maid was nice and location was quite convenient close to downtown Core
review.comment_negative:
The room they put us in which was at the Front of the building every night was noisy from karaoke and the band that played for the coffee shop good night sleep until they quit.
It was nice to have breakfast included but with only one coffee and we unknowingly asked for a 2nd cup which got charged to our bill not a good policy I told the owner to raise the price of little if you need more money for the coffee.

review.room_type: Suite Executive
Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive: Hôtel assez jolie près d'un parc, bien situé. Personne de l'accueil très efficace. L'endroit pour le petit déjeuner est très agréable. Très bonne clim !
review.comment_negative: Chambre petite, au denier étage sans ascenseur, salle de bain minuscule et douche qui ne fonctionnait pas (eau brulante et très peu de pression quasi impossible de prendre une douche le premier soir, puis réparée le deuxième jour mais ne fonctionnait  cependant pas très bien. Assez bruyant  tôt le matin, dû à des hauts parleur venant du parc.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Wonderful hotel!
My room was spacious and clean. WiFi worked well and there were no strange smells or anything (I saw in other reviews that people mentioned that). 
The location is pretty good. It's close to the city centre, market area and some pagodas. There are stores and restaurants nearby plus they have a cafe on the first floor of the hotel which is very convenient and the coffee they sell there is quite good (famous Vietnamese brand) and the staff is super nice.
The hotel staff is very nice and welcoming as well! They speak good English and the receptionist that i communicated with was  very helpful - he helped to find a bus to Can Tho and also organised a taxi for me to get to one of the temples. The taxi driver was the best, btw, and spoke English very well! :)
review.comment_negative: Everything was perfect!

review.rating: Nice clean hotel. Great coffee shop next door.
review.room_type: Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive: Nice clean hotel. Great coffee shop next door.

review.room_type: Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive:
The breakfast with only one choice, either bánh mì with beefsteak, or with 2 fried eggs, or with one egg & some can fishes in tomato sauce.

Nice view from our balcony.
review.comment_negative: We are a senior couple in our late 70’s. It was good that we are still fit to climb 4 stories up to the studio that we had reserved. This hotel has no elevator. We also wish our studio room had a glass wall or shower curtain to prevent water flashing all over the toilet when we took a shower.

review.room_type: Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive:
Wir hatten zunächst das günstigste Zimmer gebucht, um bei der Ankunft festzustellen, dass es (teils über die Außentreppen) in den 4. Stock ohne Lift in ein sehr kleines Zimmer ging. Was hab ich geflucht! Ich hatte zuvor an keiner Stelle einen Hinweis auf diese Gegebenheiten gelesen. Wir haben dann gegen Aufpreis (100.000 pro Etage) in ein Zimmer zwei Etagen tiefer gewechselt: groß mit guter Ausstattung, geräumiges Duschbad. 
Kleiner Tipp: Man sollte die Bewertungen lesen; nur aus denen geht hervor, dass kein Lift existiert. 

Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit.
review.comment_negative: Die günstigen Zimmer im 4. Stock sind sehr klein und bei Hitze nur mit ständig laufender Klimaanlage bewohnbar; kann man eigentlich nicht empfehlen.

review.rating: Très bon séjour au côté d’un super staff serviable et très gentil
review.room_type: Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive: Super établissement très bien situé

review.rating: Nice stay in a comfortable hotel with a good service.
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel with a great location close to Tra Vinh centre. My room had a nice balcony and hotel was also able to rent a motorcycle with a reasonable price.
review.comment_negative: No real complaints

review.room_type: Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Friendly staff, great location very near nice park
review.comment_negative: No elevator

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen

review.rating: good location with clean basic rooms
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: clean and quiet. nice garden and breakfast areas
review.comment_negative: room was dark and no hot water

review.rating: the staff is not friendly, room dirty
review.room_type: Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive: very bad
review.comment_negative: dirty & no elavator

review.rating: a good choice in Tra Vinh compared to available options.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: Friendly and helpful staff, stylish good sized room. breakfast OK, but no Western choice.  Location also good.
review.comment_negative: there was only one towel provided for two people, and it seemed that bed linen has not been changed after the previous guest. In addition to not seeming fresh, it had permanent stains on it.

review.rating: Top Adresse für einen Aufenthalt in Trà Vinh
review.room_type: Suite Executive
review.comment_positive:
- sehr freundliches, aufgeschlossenes und hilfsbereites Personal. 
- Der Besitzer entpuppt sich als interessanter Gesprächspartner in vielen Belangen, ist sehr belesen und weltoffen. Zudem hat er eine kreative Ader und hat einen guten Geschmack für (farbenfrohe) Dekoration. In seinem angrenzenden Café, in dem auch das Frühstück eingenommen wird, hat er die Wände mit allerlei stimmigen Wandmalereien verziert.
- das meiste in der Stadt lässt sich zu Fuss erreichen. Für die Tempelbesuche organisiert der Besitzer gerne ein Taxi, das in unserem Fall jeweils binnen wenigen Minuten bereitstand bzw. uns am jeweiligen Ort abgeholt hat.

review.room_type: Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive: view đẹp, gần trung tâm, nhân viên thân thiện
review.comment_negative: phòng hơi không sạch nhưng nhân viên hỗ trợ nhiệt tình để xử lí dù mình nhận phòng rất tối, không có thang máy lên tới tầng thượng hơi mệt

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: très pro très serviable
review.comment_negative: rien

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
Suite Executive
review.comment_positive: gần trung tâm thuận tiện
review.comment_negative: do khách sạn trồng nhiều cây nên phòng hơi bị muỗi nên cần xịt muỗi trước khi cho khách check in

review.room_type: Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive:
Séjour d'une nuit dans ce charmant hôtel situé dans le centre de Tra Vinh. Petit déjeuner inclus en partenariat avec le café d'à côté et possibilité de louer une moto (200k essence inclus). Le staff était efficace et à notre écoute. Ils nous ont aidés à booker un bus pour Can Tho et nous ont même conduit jusqu'à la station afin de s'assurer que l'on montait dans le bon bus.

Je recommande totalement surtout que la région peu touristique est absolument magnifique avec beaucoup de temple kmer.
review.comment_negative: La chambre ainsi que la salle de bain étaient un peu petites.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_negative: chăn ga bốc mùi hôi

review.room_type: Studio Tiêu Chuẩn
review.comment_positive: Hotel was beautiful with lots of plants and greenery. It's in a very convenient location that was off the main road so it wasn't too noisy. Breakfast and coffee included was delicious.
review.comment_negative: Our room was on the 4th floor that required we go up a narrow winding staircase. There is no elevator so going up/down in 30+ C heat was tiring.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: The staff were very friendly and helpful with booking taxis and providing recommendations for places and restaurants to visit. The bed was lovely and comfortable, and the rooftop bar was a nice touch as a place for an evening drink. We didn't find the park below noisy at night (most of the noise died down before 'bed time') and it actually made for a nice place to visit in the evening, as it came alive with families enjoying the space at night. Located on a lovely street close to lots of restaurants and cafes
review.comment_negative: As mentioned in other reviews, the water pressure was very hit and miss (although this may be out of their control). I also don't recall seeing anywhere to buy/refill water onsite. There is no lift, so if you struggle with stairs I would recommend asking for a room on a lower floor, but otherwise we didn't find this an issue. Overall, the hotel was a nice place to stay, and these things wouldn't have mattered at all if it was slightly less expensive

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: L'espace chambre était spacieux
review.comment_negative:
D'être au 2eme étage sans ascenseur,  
D'avoir une salle de bains /toilettes petite et inconfortable
d'avoir un petit déjeuner très en dessous de ce que l'on trouve par ailleurs autant sur la qualité que la quantité,  les employés étaient démesurément dans la culture de l'economie

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive: le personnel est très avenant
review.comment_negative: rien
